faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.deployment: What is the timeline for an AI pilot?
faq.deployment_answer: Depending on complexity, our pilots are typically deployed between 3 and 6 months, including audit, development and testing.
faq.pme_answer: Yes, we support both large corporations and SMEs. Our solutions are adaptable to all company sizes.
faq.cost: What is the cost of a pilot?
faq.cost_answer: Our pilots start at €200k with equity participation (10-15%) for a 6-12 month runway period.
faq.compliance_answer: Absolutely. All our solutions are designed from the start to comply with the European AI Act and GDPR.
